A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Whether this is a 3 Stars or a 5 stars film depends on what you want out of a movie based on a Classic like Star Wars.   If you want to be entertained\, enjoy action and dialog then this is 5 Stars. If you want the story to be consistent with the books\, the animation series\, and the old trilogies\, then theres plenty of bones to pick.
